Your baby is delivered by 
cutting through your abdomen

The cut is made across your 
abdomen, just below your 
bikini line. The scar is usually 
hidden in your pubic hair.
If you are expecting twins, 
triplets or more, it is more 
likely that you will be advised 
to have a caesarean section. 
This will depend on how your 
pregnancy progresses, the 
position of your babies and 
whether the babies share a 
placenta.
